fields.fieldText:

fields.name: Click_Next
fields.fieldText:
Click Previous button to make corrections.

Click Next button to proceed with the reversal.

fields.name: Error_Qty
fields.fieldText: Invalid Reverse Qty or Reverse Qty cannot be more than the received Qty.

fields.name: Error_Serials
fields.fieldText: No serials selected for reversal. Please select one or more serials.

fields.name: Error_message
fields.fieldText: Transaction Date ({!Transaction_Date}) cannot be in the future OR more than 1 year in the past.
